DOC.brief_summary: A Placebo Controlled Study Evaluating The Effectivess Of Medication In Preventing Seasonal Affective Disorder
DOC.criteria: ( Patient must meet criterion order eligible study . ) Patient history Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) seasonal pattern . ( Patient meet criterion order eligible study . ) Patient current past history seizure disorder brain injury . Patient history current diagnosis anorexia nervousa bulimia . Patient recurrent summer depression frequently winter depression . Patient primary diagnosis panic disorder , Obsessive Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) , Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) , acute distress disorder , bipolar II disorder psychotic disorder . Patient initiate psychotherapy within last 3 month .
